name: pikashunium-z--held
effect: Held: Allows cap-wearing pikachu to upgrade thunderbolt into 10 000 000 volt thunderbolt.
short_effect: Held: Allows cap-wearing Pikachu to upgrade Thunderbolt into 10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
This is a crystallized form of Z-Power.
It upgrades a Thunderbolt by Pikachu in a cap to
a Z-Move.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
This is a crystallized form of Z-Power.
It upgrades a Thunderbolt by Pikachu in a cap to
a Z-Move.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
This is a crystallized form of Z-Power.
It upgrades a Thunderbolt by Pikachu in a cap to
a Z-Move.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
